Upsert Document.description: Create a JSON object and upsert it to a collection.

Insert Document.description: Create a JSON object and insert it to a collection, this will fail if a document with the same key already exists.

Replace Document.description: Use an existing JsonObject document replace an existing document in a collection, this will retry if there is a cas mismatch.

Retrieve Document.description: Use a key to get a JSON object from a collection and assign it to a JSON object, this will fail if no document with the specified key exists.

Remove Document.description: Use a key to remove a document from a collection, this will fail if no document with the specified key exists.
